title: Tribal Futures - The Way Ahead - Various Electronica Artists
description:
hexagon.cc http://lossless-audiophiles-anonymous.hexagon.cc/

Music : Electro / Techno : MP3/Over 256Kbps

Format: CD rip Mp3 @ 320kbps
Country: Germany
Released: 2001
Genre: Electronic
Style: Trip Hop, Dub, Ambient, Tribal, Downtempo, Abstract


This compilation was released to raise funds for the Survival International organisation.
Survival International ('Survival') is a worldwide organisation supporting tribal peoples.
It stands for their right to decide their own future and helps them protect their lives, lands and human rights. Visit:
http://www.survival-international.org/
